/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. Cars of different makes and models are parked along the sides of the street, adding a touch of modernity to the scene. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
